nodes.text: Deputy Undersecretary to the Assistant Chief Subcounsel of the Greater Caarimon Communications Division of the Caarimon Ministry of Conservation

The title Deputy Undersecretary to the Assistant Chief Subcounsel of the Greater Caarimon Communications Division of the Caarimon Ministry of Conservation was held by Nuris Blaht, a male Caarite who worked for the Caarimon Ministry of Conservation during the Clone Wars. It basically meant that his job was to greet all off-worlders who arrived on Caarimon, the Caarite homeworld.
